name: WooCommerce Image Flipper
author: Debabrat Sharma

sections.description: A simple plugin that adds a secondary product thumbnail on product archives that is displayed when you hover over the main product image.
sections.installation:
1. Upload woocommerce-image-flipper to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload woocommerce-image-flipper to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done!

How do I control which image is displayed on hover?

The first image in the product gallery will appear on hover. Currently you cannot control which image to display.

short_description: Displays a secondary image for product archives on hover. Perfect for displaying the secondary images of products with a fade effect.
description: A simple plugin that adds a secondary product thumbnail on product archives that is displayed when you hover over the main product image.
